verbose_text: Robo1 is strongly expressed on the cell surface and in a perinuclear location in control transfected cells (XREF_FIG), while cells expressing either Ndfip1 or Ndfip2 result in reduced plasma membrane expression of Robo1 and co-localization of Robo and Ndfip proteins in the endosomal compartment (XREF_FIG, XREF_FIG, and XREF_FIG).
